name: self-tuning
prompt: Daily self-tuning. Run: 1) `botcore get_tuning_dashboard` 2) `botcore get_parameter_bounds` 3) `botcore get_adjustment_history`. If data supports it, apply up to 2 GREEN adjustments. List any YELLOW suggestions for user review. Then send a SHORT summary (under 800 chars) to Telegram by running `botcore send_telegram_notification` with the summary.
